short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Call any phone number from your helpdesk, CRM or any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make calls to any number directly from your helpdesk, CRM, or any website.
Easily initiate calls from your helpdesk, CRM, or any website with just a single click using the Plivo CX Service Chrome extension.

This extension empowers you to:
* Dial any phone number from your web browser with a single click.
* Enhance your call efficiency, saving time and effort through smooth dialing.
* Access advanced calling features such as call transfers, muting, holding, and recording with the Plivo CX Service Agent Desktop for complete call management.

After installing the Chrome extension, a phone icon automatically appears next to every phone number on any website you visit, turning phone numbers into clickable links. Simply click on the phone icon or the number to make a call via the Plivo CX Service Console.
